hero.subtitle: Transform your product specs into persuasive copy that converts visitors into customers. Let ProductGenie grant your ecommerce wishes with powerful, SEO-rich descriptions.

styleConfiguration.description: Configure the magical voice and platform style that ProductGenie will use for all your products.

styleConfiguration.platformStyleDescription: Platform-specific writing style for all descriptions

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Select a magical voice and platform style to see how ProductGenie transforms your product descriptions. Add products below to grant your ecommerce wishes!
getStarted.addProducts: Add products manually below or upload a CSV file to let ProductGenie work its magic!

csvUpload.title: Upload Your Wishlist

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Select the perfect plan for your AI product description needs
pricing.plansDescription: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include our AI-powered product description generation.

faq1.question: How do credits work?
faq1.answer: Each product description generation costs 1 credit. Credits are included with your subscription and reset monthly.

faq2.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faq2.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

faq3.question: What happens if I run out of credits?
faq3.answer: You can purchase additional credits or upgrade to a higher plan. We'll notify you when you're running low.

faq4.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq4.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all subscription plans.

billing.title: Billing & Subscription
billing.subtitle: Manage your subscription, view usage, and billing history
